meanings.definition: In a manner expressing surprise or annoyance.
meanings.sent1: She jeezely exclaimed when she saw the mess in her room.
meanings.sent2: He looked jeezely at the unexpected test result.
meanings.sent3: Jeezely, I can't believe I forgot my lunch at home again!
meanings.sent4: The news of the sudden change left her jeezely confused.
meanings.sent5: The loud noise made her jump jeezely in her seat.

meanings.definition: Used as an exclamation to express surprise or frustration.
meanings.sent1: Jeezely! That was a close call!
meanings.sent2: Jeezely, I can't believe you ate all the cookies!
meanings.sent3: Jeezely, did you see the size of that spider?
meanings.sent4: The magician's trick left the audience jeezely amazed.
meanings.sent5: Jeezely, the traffic is really bad today!
